List<GroupAccountHistory> Aurora.Framework.IMoneyModule.GetTransactions ( UUID  groupID,
UUID  agentID,
int  currentInterval,

Get a list of transactions that have occured over the given interval (0 is this period of interval days, positive s go back previous sets).

agentID Requesting agentID (must be checked whether they can call this)
